thread.title: A Wonderful Hotel For Visiting Paris -
thread.title_full: A Wonderful Hotel For Visiting Paris - Review of Hilton Paris Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bert K
title: A Wonderful Hotel For Visiting Paris -
text: The Hilton Opera is an A+ hotel located in a vibrant part of Paris. The staff, concierge team, the free breakfast all contributed to a wonderful vacation. We were in easy walking distance of the leading attractions Paris offers. I would absolutely recommend this hotel.
